jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Experience Manager Mobile On-demand Services
jcr:content.description: Adobe® Experience Manager Mobile On-demand Services empowers designers and marketers to continuously publish beautiful, engaging mobile experiences that drive measurable business impact.
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: For organizations that need to drive deep connections with their audiences, Adobe® Experience Manager Mobile On-demand Services empowers designers and marketers to easily and continuously publish beautiful, engaging mobile experiences with measurable business impact across devices.
jcr:content.serviceUrlLabel: Adobe Experience Manager Mobile On-demand Services
